metadata.title: CVE-2017-2363 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.2.1 isaffected. Safari before 10.0.3 is affected. tvOS before 10.1.1 is affected.watchOS before 3.1.3 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit"component. It allows remote attackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy andobtain sensitive information via a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
